> A precise, testable requirement or constraint. No justification, no examples, no alternatives.


**Failure Mode if Ignored (1 sentence):**
> What concretely breaks if this is not honored.

**CHECKLIST (required):**
- [ ] I confirm this issue contains *one* addendum only

**Notes:**
- Late submissions after the Phase 1 window will be recorded but will not block Phase 1 closure unless the Architect re-opens the intake.
